> About

I'm a software engineer who works at a broad scope and highly technical level with skills in general software engineering, linux and cloud computing with GCP.

I'm fascinated with the culture around DevOps and building reliable systems that scale.

When I'm not in front of a computer hacking at my console/editor, you'll find me hunched over a pillow enjoying anime.

VISITS: 0

> Projects

Cloud Resume Project

Technologies: Terraform, GCP, Golang, Github Actions

This website you're on is my cloud resume project!

It's my take on Forrest Brazeal's cloud resume challenge , although a critical component remains missing; the cloud certification.

It is a three-tiered web application that showcases my resume. codebase is available here on GitHub . Some things I did on the project are:

  • Automated infrastructure with Terraform.
  • Built backend with Golang.
  • Wrote unit and integration tests for backend with the go standard testing library.
  • Set up a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub actions.
